snippet: The Sept. 14 attacks came amid protests across the Muslim world over a private film, produced in the United States, that mocked the Prophet Muhammad.
lead_paragraph: The Sept. 14 attacks came amid protests across the Muslim world over a private film, produced in the United States, that mocked the Prophet Muhammad.

headline.main: Authorities in Tunisia Seek Death Penalties in Embassy Attacks
headline.print_headline: Tunisia: Authorities Seek Death Penalties in Embassy Attacks
